bug.author: jounih
bug.summary: Website link to interative tutorial is broken
bug.description:
The link here: <denchmark-link:https://stanfordnlp.github.io/stanza/tutorials.html>https://stanfordnlp.github.io/stanza/tutorials.html</denchmark-link>
Interactive tutorial - "A Beginnerâ€™s Guide to Stanza" is broken. It points to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/stanfordnlp/stanza/blob/master/demo/StanfordNLP_Beginners_Guide.ipynb>https://github.com/stanfordnlp/stanza/blob/master/demo/StanfordNLP_Beginners_Guide.ipynb</denchmark-link>
while the correct URL is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/stanfordnlp/stanza/blob/master/demo/Stanza_Beginners_Guide.ipynb>https://github.com/stanfordnlp/stanza/blob/master/demo/Stanza_Beginners_Guide.ipynb</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jounih>@jounih</denchmark-link> ! I've fixed the link (and added a pointer to our notebook tutorial for the CoreNLP client as well)
